Mayr Bauer Maier is a seasoned professional with over 12 years of experience.
Mayr Bauer Maier launched his career as a Financial Advisor at UniCredit Private Banking, where he gained valuable experience from 2013 to 2014.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Portfolio Manager at Erste Private Banking in 2015, further expanding his skill set.
